mapper.insert: insert into goodsSystem.staff( user_Id, shop_Id, role_Id, staff_State, money, out_Time, create_Time, update_Time) VALUES (#{userId},#{shopId},#{roleId},#{staffState},#{money},#{outTime},#{createTime},#{updateTime});
mapper.update: update goodsSystem.staff set staff_State=1 , update_Time=#{updateTime} where user_Id=#{userId} and shop_Id=#{shopId};
mapper.select: select id, user_Id, shop_Id, role_Id, staff_State, money, out_Time, create_Time, update_Time from goodsSystem.staff where id=#{id};
